description.value:
Replacement Power: In campaigns that use the optional hero point system (Pathfinder RPG Advanced Player’s Guide 322), you gain Hero’s Fortune (Advanced Player’s Guide 324) as a bonus feat. Otherwise, you gain Marked for Glory (Pathfinder RPG Mythic Adventures 69) as a bonus feat, even if you do not meet its prerequisites.

Replacement Domain Spells:

  • 2nd—@Compendium[pf1.spells.ibk7jrc5rwubpia6]{Aid}, 3rd—@Compendium[pf1.spells.3wcvosazm31i8758]{Contagious Zeal}
  • 4th— @Compendium[pf1.spells.dm52jk1e37b05v9d]{Righteous Vigor}
  • 6th— @Compendium[pf1.spells.p4h6ocn0axh59xrc]{Unshakable Zeal}
  • If you are evil, replace the domain spells @Compendium[pf1.spells.erndkoe44rgj0lob]{Holy Smite}, @Compendium[pf1.spells.osi62mwn6rpkwlm6]{Holy Sword}, and @Compendium[pf1.spells.n0vm6or4nwaylpfa]{Holy Aura} with @Compendium[pf1.spells.okui7mft5bquqfrg]{Unholy Blight}, @Compendium[pf1.spells.ftrg3ira8jwicetv]{Unholy Sword}, and @Compendium[pf1.spells.flrn1xmm2wfrxbkf]{Unholy Aura} respectively.
